name: Button Component + Variants
description:
A button component built using atomic design methodologies, autolayout, variants, and interactive components.


I've completely redesigned this file from the ground up since my previous version! I've found the content layout to be much more user friendly!


Variant Properties:

  • Size
  • Type (Primary, Secondary, Desctructionary, Minimal)
  • State (Default, Hover, Pressed, Focused, Disabled)
  • Icon (None, Left, Right, Icon Only)
  • isBlock (whether the button should span the container or not)


If you have any suggestions or comments on this file, hit me up on twitter!
